description:
Zoro and Luffy fight to the death, Nami attempts to orchestrate an uprising, and Sanji discovers he`s willing to kick a kid in order to get his memories back!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiba o Muku Zoro! Tachihadakatta Yajuu!
Zoro Bares His Fangs! A Savage Animal Stands in the Way!
Zoro montre les crocs ! Une bête sauvage se dresse !
Зоро выходит на охоту! Битва с диким животным!
โซโลหันคมเขี้ยว! สัตว์ป่าที่ขวางทาง!
牙をむくゾロ! 立ちはだかった野獣!
